knimeNode.name: Google API Connector (P&G)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a connection to access various Google APIs.

fullDescription.intro:
Creates a connection to access various Google APIs (Google Analytics, Adwords, etc.).
View basic tutorial for Google Analytic Nodes on PGTube at http://pgtube.pg.com/pgtube/play.php?id=63625-22bc7d20d2a116d6
fullDescription.option: Pre-created credential options that can be used for data access.
User refresh token used for access.

ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access various Google APIs.
